proposals.title: Forecast Food Grain Production in India
proposals.problem_statement: Predict annual production of major food grains (wheat, rice, etc.) using historical area, production, and yield data from 2020-2024. This will help in agricultural planning and food security assessments.

proposals.title: Predict Rice Export Volumes to Bangladesh
proposals.problem_statement: Develop a regression model to predict rice export quantities to Bangladesh using historical export data (2018-2024) and correlate with domestic production data. This will help assess export potential and trade planning.

proposals.title: Identify Crop Production Clusters
proposals.problem_statement: Group Indian states/crops into clusters based on historical area and yield patterns to identify regions with similar agricultural characteristics. This can inform targeted policy interventions.

proposals.title: Custom Forecasting: Production-2024-25
proposals.problem_statement: Forecast Food Grain Production in India for 2024-25
proposals.feasibility_notes: Custom task created from user query: Forecast Food Grain Production in India for 2024-25
